article_title: Fisher: Apple pie, motherhood and the American flag

og.description: There is an old adage, “when you are right no one remembers; when you are wrong no one forgets.” This saying has particular applicability when it comes to how women with children are treated by certain institutions within our society such as the Virginia Department of Social Services (DSS).
